alert.note: Alert for Darlington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Darlington County through 330 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms between Oats and near Bishopville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hartsville, North Hartsville, Lydia, Clyde, Kellytown and Carolina Pines Regional Medical Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
